replay,1,calhk001,ANA,scotd901,ANA01,I,Y,U,,N $Kole Calhoun's fly to RF was touched by a fan who reached over the wall; the ball caromed back onto the field and was ruled in play with Calhoun reaching 2B; crew chief Dale Scott requested a review, which overturned the call to fan interference; Calhoun was awarded 2B

umpchange,9,umphome,wolcq901 umpchange,9,ump3b,dimum901 umpchange,9,ump2b,(None) $Jefry Marte let go of his bat on the swing at the first pitch; the bat struck HP Umpire Paul Emmel on the top of his head, drawing blood; Emmel left with a lacerated head; 3B Umpire Quinn Wolcott moved to HP; 2B umpire Mike DiMuro moved to 3B; on the next pitch, Marte made the last out of the game
